subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
Revolutionary War, American (1775-83)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Rutgers cannon, which has a link to the Revolutionary War, is set off three times before each home game, once at halftime, once at game’s end, and after every score by the Scarlet Knights.
snippet: The Rutgers cannon, which has a link to the Revolutionary War, is set off three times before each home game, once at halftime, once at game’s end, and after every score by the Scarlet Knights.
